posts.post_content:
In the process of swapping out my P & SC backs for offs. Looking for anything and everthing. Need a bunch. Please let me know what you have with price. Nicely presenting 1's to 4's are my preference.

PM or email is fine.

Thanks!!

Scott

Bump. Still need a bunch of cards. Happy to buy or trade. Can include the copy I’m swapping out in anything so you don’t net lose a card. 

Thanks. 

Scott
Bump still looking for many commons and HOFers. Thank you.
